ukpnIncident.mainMessage: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area. Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience this may cause.
ukpnIncident.plannedIncidentReason: We're carrying out planned work in your area. For our engineers to carry it out safely they need to turn the power off.
